sense.def:
One's lap
je ploski del, ki ga oblikujemo s stegni, kadar sedimo.

seg.quote: Her youngest child was asleep in her lap.
He placed the baby on the woman's lap.

sense.def:
To complete a lap
pomeni, da je tekmovalec na krožni progi enkrat prišel okrog.

To lap another competitor
pomeni prehiteti drugega tekmovalca na dirki, ko je še v prejšnjem krogu.

Kadar voda
laps against something
, se nežno dotakne nečesa in ustvari tih zvok.

seg.quote: Waves lapped against the side of the boat.

sense.def:
Kadar neka žival
laps a drink
, si z jezikom pljuska tekočino v gobec.

seg.quote: The cat was lapping at a saucer of milk.

sense.def:
Kadar neka žival
laps up a drink
, zelo hlastno popije tekočino.

To lap up information or attention
pomeni željno sprejeti podatek ali pozornost, pogosto takrat, ko ni resnična ali iskrena.

seg.quote: It was a lie, but millions of newspaper readers lapped it up.
